name: Painter the Caveman
description:
In prehistoric times, you are an ooga booga caveman. But not your typical Joe the Caveman. You are a respected and prestigious Painter the Caveman. Under a sudden inflow of inspiration, you decide to mark the walls of a cave with a beautiful painting of a deer. Or maybe a bear? A beaver?

Whatever it is, you feel inspired and full of creative energy as you enter the cave and begin your descent into the unknown...

This project was made in under four days, and is my first ever submission to a ten day game jam. Yes, I joined a jam four days before my vacation trip, so I had to speed things up. Still, I am very proud of this little project and I had a lot of fun putting it together. Please share your thoughts down below!

Good luck, and have fun!
